mapper.insert: insert into sys_user_role (user_id, role_id, `status`, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select user_id, role_id, `status`, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_user_role
mapper.update: update sys_user_role set `status` = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
